backend/main.mo: Defines the game canister with room management, player handling, chat, and game start logic including Anchor assignment and phases.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old room state structures to new list‑based formats by converting arrays into lists.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining global color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling screen routing based on session state and backend room phase.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useCreateRoom: React Query mutation for creating rooms and updating session state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useJoinRoom.t: React Query mutation for joining rooms with error handling.
Polling hook that retrieves room state every 2 seconds.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useSendMessag: Mutation for sending chat messages with optimistic refresh.
Mutation for starting the game with host validation and phase updates.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/AppHea: Header component showing title, optional subtitle, username badge, and room code.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatCo: Chat input form with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatMe: Scrollable chat list with auto‑scrolling, timestamps, and sender styling.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ErrorB: Reusable alert component for displaying error messages.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/Screen: Layout wrapper with gradient background and fixed footer linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/playerId: Generates a unique player ID and persists it in localStorage.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/useLocal: React hook that ensures a generated username exists and allows resetting it.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/username: Generates adjective-animal-number usernames and validates them with a regex.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GameChatS: Displays the in-game chat UI with role info, messages, and composer tied to room state.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GuessingS: Shows the guessing phase UI, with different alerts for Anchor and non-Anchor players.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/HomeScree: Home screen for setting username, creating a room, or joining via room code.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/LobbyScre: Lobby interface showing players, host controls, and start‑game conditions.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/ResultsSc: Displays final game results, listing the Anchor and weird players with traits.
frontend/src/echoshift/state/session.ts: Zustand store managing session data such as player ID, username, room, host state, and screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background and text colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, architectural notes, existing features, and scope for the EchoShift MVP.
